metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000069 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: FreePlane version 1.5.9 and earlier contains a XML External Entity (XXE)vulnerability in XML Parser in mindmap loader that can result in stealingdata from victim's machine. This attack appears to require the victim toopen a specially crafted mind map file. This vulnerability appears to havebeen fixed in 1.6+.

criterions.comment: freeplane: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
